import React, {useState} from 'react'; import './css/App.scss'; import Project from './Project' import Header from './Header' import About from './About' import Socials from './Socials' import resume from "./assets/Tarun_Khasnavis_MTS.pdf" import { motion } from "framer-motion" // import Slideshow from './Slideshow' // import 'react-slideshow-image/dist/styles.css' function App() { const [MousePosition, setMousePosition] = useState({ left: 50, top: 50, }) function handleMouseMove(ev) { setMousePosition({left: ev.pageX, top: ev.pageY}); } return (

Hello

I'm Tarun, an engineer & creator.

Want to work with me?

RESUME

Designed by Tarun Khasnavis © 2021

); } export default App;
